member.name: T:InsertIntoContextMenu.Module1
member.summary: This sample provides a custom control button that will be available in the context menu for a feature layer in the TOC. Selecting this option will display a window containing the metadata for the layer.
member.remarks: 1. In Visual Studio click the Build menu. Then select Build Solution. 2. Click Start button to open ArcGIS Pro. 3. ArcGIS Pro will open. 4. Open a map that contains feature geometry. 5. Right click on a feature layer in the TOC. 6. Select Layer Viewer. ![UI](Screenshots/Screen.png) 7. The application will display the layer's metadata information. ![UI](Screenshots/Screen2.png)

member.name: M:InsertIntoContextMenu.Module1.CanUnload
member.summary: Called by Framework when ArcGIS Pro is closing
member.returns: False to prevent Pro from closing, otherwise True

member.name: P:InsertIntoContextMenu.Module1.Current
member.summary: Retrieve the singleton instance to this module here
